## Description {#details}

Helper struct for holding a set of builder options for LLVMRunPasses.

This structure is used to keep LLVMRunPasses backwards compatible with future versions in case we modify the options the new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> Manager utilizes.

Definition at line 28 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp">PassBuilderBindings.cpp</a>.
